room_title: Escape room "The Twisted Curse of Madame Antinori" by Time Trapped Escape Room in Tampa
review: So much fun! Great clues if needed. I love that all rooms are private no matter if itâ€™s just 2 people. I have had some experiences with overbearing people that makes it uncomfortable.

room_title: Escape room "The Twisted Curse of Madame Antinori" by Time Trapped Escape Room in Tampa
review: Very good escape room. cool themes and well thought out puzzles. Also good hints. Would highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Twisted Curse of Madame Antinori" by Time Trapped Escape Room in Tampa
review: My family and I had a blast trying to break the Curse of Madame Antinori. The owners, Kevin and Kristina, were very welcoming and polite. If you are looking for a challenge but great time, this is the place for you. We were able to escape and look forward to trying out their other room and any future rooms they design.
